name: DevopsBuddy
0:
”Alexa i would like to know about bdd using DevOps buddy”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: devops buddy
des: A DevOps assistant which responds to queries on everything related to DevOps. This skill enables DevOps professionals to have a knowledge resource by their side at all times. This skill can also be used in training and classroom programs that are DevOps based.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
